Beretta NANO 9mm 6RD (JMN9S15) with Pearce Grip Grip Extension Extension on one magazine. Brand new in box. Never been fired.

Nano 9mm - Comfort and Power in Concealed Carry and Personal Defense

The Nano was designed with one goal in mind: creating the ideal micro-compact pistol for concealed carry and personal defense. Thanks to its thin, snag-free profile, the Nano effortlessly glides in and out of your holster, while its smooth contour and low weight offer you maximum comfort even for all-day carry. Its operation is simple and intuitive, and its modular design gives you several custom options requiring no gunsmithing.

Easy to Conceal

Whether you like to carry inside the waistband, on the belt or in an ankle holster, the Nano will meet and surpass your needs. At less than 1" wide and just over 5" overall length, it will disappear for ideal concealment and will not "print" thanks to its flat, low profile. Also, its organic, protrusion-free design will not dig into your body as you carry it, and its polymer frame and advanced metal coating will make it highly resistant to sweat--even on hot summer days.

Personal Protection Made Easy

The Nano offers you much more than an ideal concealed-carry pistol. Thanks to its modular design based on a serialized sub-chassis, it can be easily modified with different grip-frames to accommodate your preferences and even a number of accessories like laser sights. And an optional 8+1 extended magazine makes the Nano a great choice for home defense or personal protection where deep concealment is not an issue.

Easy to Use and Maintain

The Nano gives you easy assembly and disassembly, plus adjustable sights (no gunsmithing required) that allow you to always get on target even when you change ammo brands or weight. Also, the magazine-release button on the Nano can be easily reversed for left-handed use. In short, ergonomics, size, modular structure and power make the Nano the best-in-class concealed-carry and self-defense pistol. Made in USA.

title: For Sale/Trade:  S&W 10-5 38spl Pinned 2" Round Butt + Extras
postcontent:
S&W Model 10-5 (M&P) 2" 38spl round butt K-Frame. Shiny blue with color case hardened action and wearing Pachmayr Gripper grips. In excellent condition and is still as tight as new. Has very few rounds through it. Part of the orginal M&P line. Classic DA/SA six round mid size "snub nose". Pinned barrel and is pre lock and pre MIM parts. Has a production date of 1973. Was rated in its day for beyond today's +P. The 2" barrel on the round butt frame is one of the more desirable less common pairings, alot of 10s are 4" or square butt frames. Trigger is amazing especially in SA. Comes with a HKS speed loader, new ambi soft IWB/OWB holster and 40 rounds of Remington SJHP. Only trading/selling because I have other mid size 38s and want something different.  Would rather trade but would sell for $500 obo, rather sell for a reasonable offer than trade in. Chambered for 5.56. But as many of you know it shoots .223 as well. The lower and upper are both Rock River Arms. The scope is a Vortex viper 6.5-20 mil dot.
The barrel is Molly chromed Noveske. Has the RRA two stage trigger. Magpul precision rifle stock. Harris bipod, magpul foregrip. Nickle boron BCG, so no oiling just wipe off and go. Rifle will come with ~200 rds of 5.56 and Voodoo Carrying case. Also will come with M-16 style butt stock and M4 style collapsible stock.

postcontent: Introduced in 1873, no Colt revolver has earned greater fame than the Single Action Army®, The Peacemaker®. In design and performance, in line and form, no more sculptural and practical Colt has ever been created. Movies serve as constant reminders of the role this equalizer played in winning the West.Large numbers of knock-offs and look-alikes have never been able to replace the real Colt. title: For Sale:  Kimber Solo CDP "Crimson Trace" 9mm Luger, Like New! Barely Fired!
postcontent:
I am selling my nearly new Kimber Solo that was purchased new in 10/2013 for $1250.  This gun has only had about 75 rounds put through it, and I would like to find a new home for this beautiful piece.  The workmanship on this gun is flawless, the action is glass smooth, and it is extremely accurate (5 shot groups of 3" or less can be expected).  Frame material is aluminum with a satin stainless steel slide, so the gun does kick a bit.  Barrel length is 2.67" with an overall length of 5.5".  Ambidextrous thumb safety and fixed front/rear sights. Kimber does recommend using only premium factory ammo of 124-147 grains (e.g. Federal Hydra-Shok, Rem Golden Saber, etc) to be used, so don't expect it to feed everything.  But for a premium carry pistol, this shouldn't be an issue for most folks.  All documentation included, as well as soft and hard shell cases, cleaning & adjustment tools, and the factory supplied 6 round mag (8 round mag available, not included).
I realize gun transfer laws are pretty lax in Ohio, but I will require a very short form to be completed stating that you have no known conditions preventing your purchase, and I will also need to see a Ohio state issued ID to verify you are who you say you are, and that you are at least 21 yrs old.  If you are unwilling (or unable) fulfill this requirement, please do not contact me.  Cash or PayPal accepted on delivery during daylight hours in a public place.  Please email with any questions. Thank you.

The SureFire X400U-A-RD Ultra WeaponLight integrates powerful, high intensity 500 lumen white light illumination and high visibility laser aiming capabilities in one compact rail mountable package, an extremely effective combination for close to longer range engagements in law enforcement, military, and self-defense applications. 

A high performance LED generates 500 lumens of brilliant white light that is focused by a Total Internal Reflection (TIR) lens to produce a beam with a bright central area, providing greatly extended reach and significant surround light for peripheral vision. The X400 Ultra produces tactical level light�enough to overwhelm an aggressor's dark adapted vision�for 1.5 hours per set of batteries. 

The X400 Ultra's laser is located below the primary light, and its aiming adjustment mechanism uses Nylok screws that won't back out from the effects of recoil, which means it rarely needs to be re-zeroed. The X400U-A-RD Ultra features our original high visibility 5-milliwatt / 635 nm red laser.

The versatile X400 Ultra can be attached to a pistol or a long gun since its Rail-Lock system permits rapid attachment/detachment to either universal or Picatinny rails. Its integral ambidextrous push/toggle switch provides one finger operation for either momentary or constant-on operation. Optional DG grip switches are available for use with a pistol, and an XT07 tape switch permits the X400 Ultra to be activated when attached to a long gun without altering your grip on your weapon. 

The high strength aerospace aluminum body is Mil-Spec hard anodized for superior toughness and corrosion resistance and is O-ring and gasket sealed to keep out dust and moisture.

FITS: Handguns and long guns with Picatinny or Universal rails

title: For Sale:  SOLD-SIG 938 9MM with 3 holsters, original box and 2 7 round extended mags, nite sights.
postcontent: I have a SIG 938 that has served as a pocket pistol for the past 2 years. It comes in the factory box which includes a holster kit and 2 extended mags. I am also including a Shepherd IWB leather holster and a DeSantis pocket holster. I have shot a mag or 2 each month in order to ensure I can use it properly, if necessary.  I estimate it has 400-500 rounds. I wipe it down weekly and clean it with every use.  I use it in "polite carry" situations and as a backup to a 1911 45 which is my EDC.  It has an AMBI safety and I carry it in condition one in the pocket holster.  It is a good shooter, but, like most pocket rockets, it's effective range is 25 feet or less, for me.  It is not "fun" for me to shoot. It is used as a defense weapon and works well for that.  It shows some wear, as you would expect, but, it is in excellent condition.  I understand you may not have an interest in the 2 extra holsters, but, I am not keeping them and I am placing less than half their value into the cost.  I need cash and will not trade.  I will meet FTF in Powell or Polaris only.  My $550 cash price is FIRM.

title: For Sale:  SIG P228 Collector Grade
postcontent:
This is considered one of the “original” German mfg’d SIGs of superior quality which are highly sought-after by SIG collectors.  This one has a “KE” date code (1994), and Ulm and Kiel proof marks stamped into the underside of the forward slide.  Ulm proof also stamped on right side of frame after sernr.

Its condition is as-NIB, and was purchased new in MA in 1994.  It’s been sitting in a collection unfired, unused or carried.  One magazine has been inserted several times over the years with negligible wear, and the slide has been retracted probably once or twice a year for the past 20 or so years when it was taken out of the safe & wiped down.  

Comes with original container w/sleeve, packing materials, literature, 2 magazines, documentation & factory sighting target.  This would really be appreciated by a SIG aficionado, and it would be nice to see this one go into someone’s collection. 

For sale only; no trades considered.  Cash, money order/bank check only.

Massachusetts Face-to-face private transaction in accordance w/all regs.  Transaction must be conducted in Woburn area. 

Interstate transfer & shipment fees via 01 FFL paid by buyer.  

Not good with a camera, but more photos available upon request.

title: For Sale:  Barrett M107A1 50 cal Sniper Rifle Complete Nightforce Scope & BORS System
postcontent:
Barrett M107A1 50 cal + possible ammo deal (see below)

I am selling a Barrett M107A1 sniper rifle to help fund my next firearms project.
I have a couple of them so I'm not desperate to sell so please don't think I will take some lowball offer so let's not waste each others time.

I have successfully shot steel targets at 1800+ yards with both 660gr & 760gr bullets and have found this setup to be consistently accurate.

I purchased the gun new and added the Nightforce scope and the Barrett BORS system.

The gun has been properly broke in according to manufacturers specifications.

My wife is 5'3" 110lbs and she enjoys shooting this gun. There is minimal recoil.

I am willing to sell the rifle for $10,000.00 without the scope and BORS system or for $13,500.00 as shown.

The rifle itself retails for $14,000.00 the scope was over $2,000.00 including rings and the BORS and mount was around $2,000.00 as well so the price is a good one for this setup.

I have over 1300 rounds of ammo that I am willing to make a deal on as well. It will be much less than it costs in the store. All ballistics for the ammo I have is programmed into the BORS system and it is extremely accurate!

Barretts BORS Information


LEAVE NOTHING TO CHANCE.
The Barrett Optical Ranging System (BORS) is an integrated ballistics computer that mounts directly on the riflescope and couples to the elevation knob.

BORS instantly takes care of the data work by drawing from several tables and taking into account a number of real-time external factors so you can focus on the task of achieving first round hits.

After determining the range to target, simply turn the elevation knob until the BORS screen matches your target's distance. Internal sensors automatically calculate the ballistic solution. BORS compensates for temperature and barometric pressure, calculates angle cosine and displays rifle cant.

BORS
The BORS kit includes the proprietary Barrett Ballistic PC Software that's pre-programmed with a library selected by Barrett. BORS USB data cable allows the transfer of user programmable custom loads to BORS from his or her computer.

Designed primarily to withstand military operations, BORS is rugged and able to operate with a variety of scopes, calibers and rifles.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nU9tJYgtIGs

title: For Sale:  New FN SCAR 17S FDE 762 FHN 17 s AR10 rifle 7.62
postcontent:
Experience the long-range accuracy, downrange power, exceptional reliability and match winning versatility of the FN SCAR 17S, the semi-auto only version of the U.S. Special Operations Command's newest service rifle. 

Chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO (308 Win.), the SCAR 17S features a free-floating, cold hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR 17S to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated MIL-STD 1913 optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. The telescoping, side-folding polymer stock is fully adjustable for comb height and length of pull, making it ideal for Heavy Metal 3-Gun matches. 

Features:

- Gas-operated, short-stroke piston design 
- 7.62x51mm NTO/308 Winchester chambering 
- Ambidextrous rotating manual safety
- Reciprocating bolt handle adapts for right or left side operation
- Ambidextrous magazine release with protective surround fence to prevent unintentional activation 
- Interchangeable free floating 16.25" hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel 
- Hard chromed bore
- PWS muzzle break 
- Folding adjustable rear sight - Folding hooded front sight
- Integrated MIL-STD 1913 mounting rail at 12 o'clock position on alloy receiver
- Three MIL-STD 1913 mounting rails at 3, 6 and 9 o-clock positions 
- Matte black finish on barrel and gas system surfaces
- Anodized Flat Dark Earth tan on alloy receiver
- Polymer trigger module with molded-in Flat Dark Earth tan
- Side-folding Flat Dark Earth polymer stock instantly adjusts for both comb height and length of pull 
- A2 type checkered pistol grip with finger indexing ridge

Specifications:

- Caliber: 308 Winchester/7.62x51mm NATO
- Twist Rate: 1 in 12"
- Barrel Length: 16.25"
- Overall Length: 28.5” to 38.5”
- Weight: 8.0 lbs. empty
- Ammunition Capacity: 20-round detachable box magazine.

Manufacturer: 	 FNH USA
Model: 	 SCAR
Caliber: 	 .308 Win.
Barrel Length: 	 16 inch
Capacity: 	 20-29

No trades.

title: For Sale:  M1910 Maxim Machine Gun (semiauto)
postcontent:
ON THE BLOCK: THIS M1910 MAXIM GUN SET!!!! 

Folks, if you love the iconic Maxim gun as much as I do, this is your chance to own one! It’s semiautomatic, so no worries about NFA. This collection is the results of years of loving searching and sourcing oddball parts and accessories from all over the ‘net, surplus dealers, gun shows, etc. This is not something you pop into the store for Tuesday cuz' you're bored-This is something special that only comes around once in a blue moon. I would love to keep it, but I got kids, no time, and no space for it.

History

This Maxim started life in the Tula arsenal in 1929. From there, I assume she was captured during the Red Army’s disastrous Winter War invasion of Finland, during which the Red Army was routed by the much smaller, much weaker, poorly-supplied Finnish Army. The Red Army lost mountains of supplies and weapons, apparently including this machine gun, which was then used by the Finns. The top cover has a nice SA Suomen Armelinen stamp above the Soviet one, indicating Finnish army use. This gun was most likely used in WWII, as well, against her original manufacturers. Later, after decades in Finnish armories, this machine gun was sold to US importers, who removed the side plate and sold it as parts. From there, Dennis Ricke of Midwest Metal creations assembled the parts with a new semiauto side plate in 2009, which is when I got her. Since then, she’s been taken to a variety of air shows and reenactments and been treated like a queen.

Equipment

I’ve taken a great deal of time to dig up accessories for this gun, which wasn’t easy. There are very few dealers out there who specialize in Maxim guns and related militaria, so I’ve spent untold hours searching for parts and tools and spares. A list of the accessories for this gun follows below:

1x M1910 Maxim
1x Sokolov Wheeled Mount
 --This is the wheeled cart you see the Maxims mounted on. 
1x Sokolov Mount Gun Shield
 --This is an angled steel plate that mounts to the gun mount. 
1x Tow Strap
 --This is a hemp rope with wooden tow handle. I’m not sure who issued them.
1x Soviet tool bag
 --Soviet-issue tool kit bag with strap. I put the Finnish case contents in here.
1x Finnish tool case
 --Finnish leather case for tool kit, includes tin box of spare parts, cartridge case tongs, wrench, oiler, etc Stamped SA.
1x oiler 
--Antique oiler can. Not military, but period-correct, functional, and looks cool.
1x Finnish belt loader
 --This is a simple tool that folds up in its own wooden case. Allows you to feed rounds through the top and crank one into a loop at a
 time via a back and forth lever action. Ammo is fed from the top via 2 semi-circular trays resembling wings. Stamped SA.
1x Finnish blank booster
--This is the Maxim version of a blank adapter. Fits over the muzzle for blank fire. Painted yellow to prevent mix-ups. Comes in its own special can for soaking in oil.
1x Finnish condenser can
--Green-painted steel can with brass cap for water. Water Jacket hose leads into can to allow steam to condense back into water. You can fire without the can-the gun takes a while to heat up, but it adds authenticity.
1x Finnish water jacket hose
--Old rubber hose with brass fitting. Connects to port at front of barrel jacket and feeds steam to condenser can.
5x steel ammo belts
--Steel Maxim belts. 3 still in protective storage paper. 1 belt appears to be a Finnish-made belt and looks a bit different. One belt
 comes with about 170 blank rounds on it partly as a bonus and partly cuz’ I’m too lazy to pop them out. I’m sure you can find a way to 
enjoy them.
1x canvas ammo belt
--Original Soviet-issue canvas belt with brass feed tabs. THESE are not that common, especially in good condition. I never used it,
 aside from display purposes.
1x Soviet ammo can with star
--Soviet steel ammo can with raised star imprint in the center. 
2x antique Maxim ammo cans (poss. Pre-Soviet)
--These are antique Maxim gun ammo cans. They are riveted, not stamped, and have thick green paint on them with painted canvas carry handles. One is stamped 1915! The other has no stamps. Both are Finnish SA marked and may be pre-WWII Finnish army or Winter War captures.
1x Finnish spare barrel carrier
--This is a leather case made for carrying a spare Maxim barrel. It’s rough. I’ve never used it, just kept it with the other accessories. I’ll be happy to scrub it with some Saddle Soap for you.
1x Data CD-ROM
--This is the information supplied by the gunsmith, Dennis Ricke, of Midwest Metal Creations. This CD contains his step-by-step instructions on how he built the gun and some tips on troubleshooting. 
1x DVD-ROM 
--These are a few files I threw on DVD as a bonus. There are a couple Soviet Maxim manuals, a few pics, and a couple Russian movies, including Brestskaya Krepost (sp?), an epic Russian movie about the defense of Brest Fortress in WWII. If you haven’t seen it, it’s action-packed and about as depressing as any Russian movie is.
-Buyer also receives approximately 170 blanks on steel belt pictured in photo, unless you don't want free blanks.

PRICE: $6,000 

CONDITION: I’m selling you a gun that was originally manufactured over 80 years ago by a nation that no longer exists and which fought in at least the Winter War and probably fought again in WWII. It was used in Karelia, Finnland, arguably some of the most inhospitable terrain in the world, during some of the heaviest fighting in human history. You can see some kind of battle damage to the water jacket, which is dented in several places towards the rear. The accessories are also used. You can see dings and gouges and wear from actual use. This gun is used, reconditioned, and rebuilt. Everything is functional, but there are no guarantees.

Additional photos available.  
Terms of Sale- Payment to be completed in cash.  Transfer to be completed via FFL.

postcontent:
Experience the long-range accuracy, downrange power, exceptional reliability and match winning versatility of the FN SCAR 17S, the semi-auto only version of the U.S. Special Operations Command's newest service rifle. 

Chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO (308 Win.), the SCAR 17S features a free-floating, cold hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR 17S to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated MIL-STD 1913 optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. The telescoping, side-folding polymer stock is fully adjustable for comb height and length of pull, making it ideal for Heavy Metal 3-Gun matches. 

Features:

- Gas-operated, short-stroke piston design 
- 7.62x51mm NTO/308 Winchester chambering 
- Ambidextrous rotating manual safety
- Reciprocating bolt handle adapts for right or left side operation
- Ambidextrous magazine release with protective surround fence to prevent unintentional activation 
- Interchangeable free floating 16.25" hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel 
- Hard chromed bore
- PWS muzzle break 
- Folding adjustable rear sight - Folding hooded front sight
- Integrated MIL-STD 1913 mounting rail at 12 o'clock position on alloy receiver
- Three MIL-STD 1913 mounting rails at 3, 6 and 9 o-clock positions 
- Matte black finish on barrel and gas system surfaces
- Anodized Flat Dark Earth tan on alloy receiver
- Polymer trigger module with molded-in Flat Dark Earth tan
- Side-folding Flat Dark Earth polymer stock instantly adjusts for both comb height and length of pull 
- A2 type checkered pistol grip with finger indexing ridge

Specifications:

- Caliber: 308 Winchester/7.62x51mm NATO
- Twist Rate: 1 in 12"
- Barrel Length: 16.25"
- Overall Length: 28.5” to 38.5”
- Weight: 8.0 lbs. empty
- Ammunition Capacity: 20-round detachable box magazine

title: For Sale:  New FN SCAR 17S FDE 762 FHN 17 s AR10 rifle 7.62
postcontent:
Experience the long-range accuracy, downrange power, exceptional reliability and match winning versatility of the FN SCAR 17S, the semi-auto only version of the U.S. Special Operations Command's newest service rifle. 

Chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO (308 Win.), the SCAR 17S features a free-floating, cold hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel with hardchromed bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls instantly adapt the SCAR 17S to any user or any shooting position. The receiver-integrated MIL-STD 1913 optical rail plus three accessory rails enable mounting of a wide variety of scopes, electronic sights, tactical lights and lasers. The telescoping, side-folding polymer stock is fully adjustable for comb height and length of pull, making it ideal for Heavy Metal 3-Gun matches. 

Features:

- Gas-operated, short-stroke piston design 
- 7.62x51mm NTO/308 Winchester chambering 
- Ambidextrous rotating manual safety
- Reciprocating bolt handle adapts for right or left side operation
- Ambidextrous magazine release with protective surround fence to prevent unintentional activation 
- Interchangeable free floating 16.25" hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel 
- Hard chromed bore
- PWS muzzle break 
- Folding adjustable rear sight - Folding hooded front sight
- Integrated MIL-STD 1913 mounting rail at 12 o'clock position on alloy receiver
- Three MIL-STD 1913 mounting rails at 3, 6 and 9 o-clock positions 
- Matte black finish on barrel and gas system surfaces
- Anodized Flat Dark Earth tan on alloy receiver
- Polymer trigger module with molded-in Flat Dark Earth tan
- Side-folding Flat Dark Earth polymer stock instantly adjusts for both comb height and length of pull 
- A2 type checkered pistol grip with finger indexing ridge

Specifications:

- Caliber: 308 Winchester/7.62x51mm NATO
- Twist Rate: 1 in 12"
- Barrel Length: 16.25"
- Overall Length: 28.5” to 38.5”
- Weight: 8.0 lbs. empty
- Ammunition Capacity: 20-round detachable box magazine.

No trades

title: For Trade:  ** S&W COLLECTORS ** TWO VIRGINIA STATE POLICE 10MMS 1026 & 1076
postcontent:
If you know anything about 10mms you know these were the strongest ever built. No other 10s can compare to there strength durability and accuracy.
Both of these guns have been documented by Roy Jinks at S&W as being special ordered for the VSP.
The first gun is a 1026 S&W only made 3135 of this model with 90% being sold to LE only. It looks new inside and out and was only used to qualify with. It comes in the #s matching box with everything it did when it went to the VSP including unopened cleaning kit.
The second gun is a 1076 that was special ordered by the VSP as well. Comes in the factory box and it to looks new inside and out and was only used to qualify with. Both guns come with 3 magazines each. The 1076 also comes with the Master Copy of the owners manual and complete parts breakdown.
After buy back from the dept. both guns were sent back to S&W where both slides were polished to a mirror finish as well as both barrels and feed ramps. The triggers were also tuned. Both guns look amazing and come in two S&W range bags.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Remington 760 Gamemaster
location: West Little Rock, Little Rock, Arkansas
postcontent:
I have a Remington 760 Gamemaster in 30.06 
The bluing shows normal wear and has no rust. The rifling is crisp; the pump action is smooth as butter and locks up like a bank vault.

It comes with three magazines: two 4 round magazines and one 10 round magazine (hard to find).  It is wearing a vintage compact Simmons 3x9 scope with pop up scope covers.  It also has a Black aftermarket composite butt stock and forearm with sling swivels.

This is a good shooting rifle and I hate to see it go, but I have a couple projects that need funding. This is the perfect brush busting rifle. With the ten round mag loaded up, you can put some serious “get down” on a herd of swine or “roll up” a few coyotes!

If you could use an all around Bear, Elk, Mule Deer, Antelope, Whitetail Deer, Hoar Hog, Taliban Terrorist, or Coyote getter, shoot me an email.

title: For Sale:  Ambush Arms 6.8 SPC II AR Rifle
postcontent:
Excellent condition. This is an outstanding AR Rifle made by Ambush Arms, the hunting division of Daniel Defense. I'll paste the specs of the rifle below. It's a very accurate rifle, I find it shoots best with Federal MSR, Wilson Combat ammo, and Silver State. Though it shoots everything well. I have on it a Weaver Grand Slam, *which I am not including with the rifle*. I hunt with it using a suppressor/silencer. It's a great deer rifle; small and maneuverable and relatively light weight. Much more so than the full size .308 ARs. The 6.8 is an outstanding caliber, if you're not familiar with it. It's an excellent deer cartridge, outperforming the 5.56 and .300 BO. It shoots flat and is accurate, and has plenty of terminal performance. It's plenty for big body Northern woods deer. 

With this rifle I've also dropped a Texas wild boar, and with a different 6.8 rifle I dropped 2 more Wild boars, one of them was charging me. This rifle and the 6.8 also make an excellent coyote tandem.

Will take cash or cash+trade. Make your best offer...

The Target picture is Hornady 110gr V-Max, 100 yards, 20rds, rapid fire

FROM THE WEBSITE:

No longer do you have to compromise weight for takedown power, now you can have both.   Keeping with our philosophy of tailoring a rifle to the needs of the sportsman, the Ambush 6.8 SPCII is not only lightweight, it’s modular, utilizing a Picatinny Rail system, and adjustable buttstock.

DETAILS
The Ambush Firearms 6.8 SPCII hunting rifle features an 18” S2W® profile, Cold Hammer Forged barrel.  The chamber and rifling are created at the same time for the most precise alignment of the chamber to bore possible.  Cold Hammer Forging alters the steel at a molecular level creating the most accurate, longest lasting barrels available.  The barrels are Salt Bath Nitride treated, giving the steel the corrosion and abrasion resistance to stand up season after season.  The Ambush Firearms 6.8 SPCII features a threaded muzzle allowing the installation of a sound suppressor or other muzzle device.

Protecting the barrel is the free-floating MFR 12.0 (Modular Float Rail) with adjustable shotgun-inspired hand grip which is exclusive to Ambush Firearms.  The top of the handgaurd features a continuous picatinny rail for attaching optics and sights.  Included are three 3-Inch modular rail sections for mounting accessories.  These modular rail sections can be easily moved anywhere on the hanguard or removed completely.

Every sportsman has a duty to make clean shots on their game and a crisp 2-Stage Geissele Super Semi-Automatic (SSA®) Trigger, gives the shooter an advantage delivering precise fire to the target.  (Geissele SSA® has a total pull weight of 4.5 lb, 2.5 lb on the first stage and 2 lb on the second stage).   

Ambush Firearms Hunting rifles are available 2 finishes: Black and REALTREE AP®.

MATERIALS & CONSTRUCTION
Upper Receiver: Mil-Spec with Indexing Marks and M4 Feed Ramps
Barrel: Cold Hammer Forged, 1:11” twist, 18″ S2W® Profile, Mid-length Gas System, MP tested, and Salt Bath Nitride Finished, muzzle threaded 5/8"-24 with thread protector
Chamber: 6.8 SPCII
Bolt Carrier Group: Chrome Lined, Properly Staked Gas Key
Gas Block: Low Profile Gas Block
Handguard: Free-Floating Modular Rail
Trigger: Two-Stage Geissele Super Semi-Automatic (SSA®) Trigger
Grip: Shotgun inspired hand grip
Rail: (3x) 3” Picatinny Modular Rail Sections
Made in the USA!
WARRANTY STATEMENT 
The Ambush Hunting Rifle carries a 100% satisfaction guarantee against defects in original materials and workmanship.  If your Ambush Hunting Rifle shows evidence of such defects, Ambush Firearms will make every accommodation to fix, repair, or replace your firearm in the most expeditious and inexpensive manner possible.  Ambush Firearms does not warranty products or damage caused to our products by the correct or incorrect installation of other manufacturer’s products.  Be sure to retain your sales slip as proof of purchase date when making a claim.

SPECIFICATIONS
Manufacturing # / SKU	Ambush_6.8_SPCII
Restricted Shipping	Yes
Gas System	Mid-length
Caliber	6.8mm
Product Weight	7.3 lb
